title: ‘The Good Fight’: Michelle and Robert King Give Closing Arguments
description: The legal series thrived on real-world disruption, drawing story lines from events both actual and anticipated. In an interview, the creators took stock.
dc:creator: Jennifer Vineyard
media:description: Christine Baranski, left, and Audra McDonald in a scene from the chaotic series finale of “The Good Fight,” which is set amid mounting civil unrest.
